hadiths.english_translation: He heard from Abd al-Malik ibn Umair and Hisham ibn Urwah. From him (it) was heard by Abdullah ibn Yusuf. Also, Yahya ibn al-Yamam narrated from al-Hakam ibn Hisham from Qatadah, and also Kathir ibn Hisham.
